needClass.en: Need a class to generate property

needPrivateAttribute.en: Need a private attribute starting with "_"
needPrivateAttribute.zh-cn: 需要以 "_" 开头的私有属性

needPythonEnvironment.en: The plugin requires a Python environment. Please install Python and configure the environment variables
needPythonEnvironment.zh-cn: 该插件需要Python环境，请安装Python并配置环境变量

variableConflict.en: The variable in the loop conflicts with the traversed object
variableConflict.zh-cn: 循环变量与遍历对象重名

importConflict.en: The class name conflicts with the imported class
importConflict.zh-cn: 当前类已有同名类导入，将覆盖导入的类

missingSuperInit.en: This class does not inherit the parent's __init__, which may cause some parent attributes to be inaccessible
missingSuperInit.zh-cn: 该类未继承父类初始化，可能会导致父类某些属性无法调用

restartExtension.en: The ColorPicker setting changed. Please reload the window to take effect
restartExtension.zh-cn: ColorPicker 设置已更改，需重启插件生效

changed.zh-cn: 语言已切换为 中文
